snippet.title: The Voice Inside | Voice-Controlled Game | TRAILER
snippet.description:
[Trailer outdated]

STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1032280/The_Voice_Inside/

WEBSITE: https://www.adk-games.com/
__________________________________________________________________________________
SHORTFACTS:
Release Date:           2019/20
Platform:                    Steam (PC)
Supports:          Voice-Control , Controller 
Genre:                        Indie, Psychological Horror, Puzzle, Adventure, Voice-Control
Player/View:                Single-Player, Third Person
Language:                    English
Requirements:           Headset/Microphone/Controller


DESCRIPTION:
The Voice Inside is a completely voice-controlled, psychological horror game[/B], developed for a whole new voice-driven game experience. You can choose between [B]more than 30 voice commands to navigate a nearly blind character, solve puzzles and perform actions to recover the light in a dark, infected and abstract world. The character reacts to simple commands, such as 'move', 'run','45 left/right', 'show commands' and many more. A voice inside the game will guide and help you to find a way out.

Edited: 11/16//2019

Video: Vers.: Alpha 0.0.4 (outdated)
